title: NFT promotion for ymen-mutant holders
body:
Best promotion is when people show of their really cool cards and start selling them on open ocean. This will get things started!
To create an even and fair distribution of airdropped NFT cards to ymen mutant LP holders, anybody who was a lp holder on 16-10-2020 12:00 utc*  will be airdropped a random yman NFT. 
To create the random airdrop, a script needs to be written by the team to do so and a list needs to be made with which NFT's will be airdropped. 
Common cards will be dropped more often then super rare. 
Basically it will be like a lottery, but everybody will be a winner. 
(* the chosen date needs to be a date in the past before this proposal was created to prevent people making multiple wallets). 

Alternatively, we can propose a more basic NFT airdrop to all token holders (same snapshot date 16-10). 
In this case, everybody will get the same NFT.
choices: Randomized Y-men NFT to all ymen/mutant lp holders
Simple Y-men NFT to all ymen/mutant lp holders
author: 0x1Fa4823613Fb2424cbDab225FC1eEfe3Bd293c84
